name: noose
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] one end of a rope tied to form a circle that can be tightened round something such as a person's neck to hang (= kill) them: They put him on the back of a horse and looped a noose around his neck.
bdspn/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ S ] a serious problem or limit: The noose of poverty was tightening (= becoming more serious) daily.
